They wait until one step is proven before they start manufacturing at big scale to get it ready." - Dr. Fauci "My projection is that by the end of the year, beginning of 2021, we'll have a vaccine that we can start distributing to people."
Dr. Fauci of @NIH "We saved at least a year or more by technological advances. In a few days we'll be in Phase 3."
Phase 1 looks at safety.
Phase 2 amplifies that.
Phase 3 determines does it really work. 
How long does Phase 3 take? Several months at best. Some  take years.
-Dr. Fauci Where are we in the journey? 
The vaccine journey is very clear, says Dr. Fauci. "Historically this is the fastest we've ever launched into safe and effective vaccines in history." Sal kicks it off asking how Dr. Fauci is handling the pandemic personally.
Dr. Fauci says it's stressful. "It is what I do. I have been doing this my entire professional life. Going back 40 years to HIV/AIDS. This is part of the job. It's not easy." We are LIVE now.

Let us know if any further questions. 😊 @MrBodde Re: Q2 “Can students reach 100% mastery without using the missions page” Yes! If a student doesn’t use Missions, but instead only uses the “explore” section, they can achieve 100% mastery. @MrBodde Re: Q1 cont'd: Getting 100% on all units would get you 80% of the way to mastering the course, and getting 100% on the course challenge gets you the remaining 20%. *BUT* we are now changing this so that the course challenge is optional. @MrBodde Re: Q1 “Can a student still reach 100% mastery by completing just the missions section?” Our new system was designed to require that a student gets 100% on all the units AND 100% on the course challenge (which didn’t exist in missions) to achieve 100% mastery for a course.
